guide.introduction: I will teach you how to build a TV antenna, not for picking up any signals with, but for decoration and model building.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I will teach you how to build a TV antenna, not for picking up any signals with, but for decoration and model building.

Relevant parts
  • Flat rods (about 100cm/4ft 7in)
  • Hot glue (If you are using another glue this is not needed)
Tools
  • Hack saw
  • Hot glue gun (If you are using another glue this is not needed)
  • Ruler
  • Sharpie

parts.notes: (you can use windshield wiper rods too)

parts.text: Hot glue (If you are using another glue this is not needed)

lines.text: First, cut out the parts you need from the rods according to the list. To the side you can see a few of the rods that are cut.
lines.text_raw: First, cut out the parts you need from the rods according to the list. To the side you can see a few of the rods that are cut.

lines.text: A: one 2cm; B: one 7cm; C: one 5½cm; D: one 8½cm; E: one 7cm; F: one 6cm; G: two 4½cm; H: two 3cm; I: two 3½cm; J: one 9½cm; K: one 11cm; L: two 4½cm
lines.text_raw: '''A:''' one 2cm; '''B:''' one 7cm; '''C:''' one 5½cm; '''D:''' one 8½cm; '''E:''' one 7cm; '''F:''' one 6cm; '''G:''' two 4½cm; '''H:''' two 3cm; '''I:''' two 3½cm; '''J:''' one 9½cm; '''K:''' one 11cm; '''L:''' two 4½cm

lines.text: Rod K is not on real T.V. antennas but it is great for support.
lines.text_raw: Rod K is not on real T.V. antennas but it is great for support.

lines.text: The vertical rod in the middle piece is rod A with (in order from bottom to top) rod B, C, D, E, and F. Mark with a sharpie these next spots. Mark a spot that is 2cm from the bottom, 4cm from the bottom, 6cm from the bottom, 8cm from the bottom, 9½cm from the bottom, and 11cm from the bottom. Rod B will go on the 2cm mark, rod C will go on the 4cm mark, rod D will go on the 6cm mark, rod E will go on the 9½cm mark, and rod F will go onto the 11cm mark. NOTHING GOES ON THE 8cm MARK YET.
lines.text_raw: The vertical rod in the middle piece is rod A with (in order from bottom to top) rod B, C, D, E, and F. Mark with a sharpie these next spots. Mark a spot that is 2cm from the bottom, 4cm from the bottom, 6cm from the bottom, 8cm from the bottom, 9½cm from the bottom, and 11cm from the bottom. Rod B will go on the 2cm mark, rod C will go on the 4cm mark, rod D will go on the 6cm mark, rod E will go on the 9½cm mark, and rod F will go onto the 11cm mark. NOTHING GOES ON THE 8cm MARK YET.

lines.text: The 2 parts on the outside are the parts G, H, and I. The vertical rods in those are rods G. On that rod make marks that are 13mm, and 3cm away from the bottom of rod G. Rod H will go onto the 13mm mark and rod I will go on the 3cm mark.
lines.text_raw: The 2 parts on the outside are the parts G, H, and I. The vertical rods in those are rods G. On that rod make marks that are 13mm, and 3cm away from the bottom of rod G. Rod H will go onto the 13mm mark and rod I will go on the 3cm mark.

lines.text: Once you have placed the rods on the right marks, glue them down.
lines.text_raw: Once you have placed the rods on the right marks, glue them down.

lines.text: Now for rods J, K, and L. The two L rods will be glued into a "+" sign. Hot-glue rod J straight up from rods L. Rod K is glued at a 45-degree angle from rod J.
lines.text_raw: Now for rods J, K, and L. The two L rods will be glued into a "+" sign. Hot-glue rod J straight up from rods L. Rod K is glued at a 45-degree angle from rod J.

lines.text: Now take part A (the vertical rod with the 5 others on it) and the two G assemblies (Rods G with the two other rods on them). Take one G assembly and, on the 8cm mark, glue the bottom of rod G at a 45-degree angle from rod A. Do the same with the other part G on the other side.
lines.text_raw: Now take part A (the vertical rod with the 5 others on it) and the two G assemblies (Rods G with the two other rods on them). Take one G assembly and, on the 8cm mark, glue the bottom of rod G at a 45-degree angle from rod A. Do the same with the other part G on the other side.

lines.text: Now for the final step. Glue the other end of part J to the bottom of rod A right next to bottom of rod G. Finally, hot-glue the other end of part K to the bottom side of the 2cm mark.
lines.text_raw: Now for the final step. Glue the other end of part J to the bottom of rod A right next to bottom of rod G. Finally, hot-glue the other end of part K to the bottom side of the 2cm mark.

lines.text: CONGRATULATIONS!!!!! You made a model T.V. antenna!
lines.text_raw: CONGRATULATIONS!!!!! You made a model T.V. antenna!

lines.text: As you can see I am not a glue master but I hope you can do better!
lines.text_raw: As you can see I am not a glue master but I hope you can do better!
